channel.title: Design on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Design on MyThinkPond

item.title: Converted Wordpress.com Hosted Blog to Hugo Static Blog :-)
item.description: Summary Thanks to Hugo Static Site generator written in GoLang and Mainroad Theme, I was able to port over my personal blog MyThinkPond. Before and After Here is a screenshot of the belore site: MyThinkPond under Wordpress hosting Here is a screenshot of the belore site: MyThinkPond under Wordpress hosting I think it’s a move in the right direction. Putting me in complete control of the content, images and all artifacts that goes into bundling the site.

item.title: Elements of JavaScript Style – JavaScript Scene – Medium
item.description: Great article focusing on Javascript style. Provides some good examples of JavaScript coding styles, practices, and things to avoid. The examples includes: 1. Make the function the unit of composition. One job for each function. 2. Omit needless code. 3. Use active voice. 4. Avoid a succession of loose statements. 5. Keep related code together. 6. Put statements and expressions in positive form.
